commoner.name: Commoner
commoner.description: Regular old minecraft character, no abilities, no debuffs

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.description: A master of potion making, Alchemists excel in the art of the brew.

Enraging Elixir.description: Create a potion cloud that grants strength to those in the area. Must be sneaking to activate.

Essence Refining.description: Low chance to gain random potions as drops when killing mobs.

Healing Spring.description: Create a potion cloud that grants regeneration to those in the area.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: Unmatched warriors with the ability to conquer any foe. Their knowledge of fighting forms helps them adapt to any enemy.

explorer.name: Explorer
explorer.description: Masters of terrain, Explorers widen the world with every new sight they see.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Masters of shadow the rogue is trained in the deadly arts.

builder.name: Builder
builder.description: Talented and efficient, Builders get the job done no matter the cost.
